nl.tno.stormcv.util.connector

Interface FileConnector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClasspathConnector, FtpConnector, LocalFileConnector, S3Connector

    public interface FileConnector
extends Serializable
    An interface for connectors to (remote) locations like AWS S3. Implementing this interface and registering the implementation in the StormCVConfig will enable the platform to access the remote location.
    Author:
    Corne Versloot

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      • copyFile

        void copyFile(File localFile,
            boolean delete)
              throws IOException
        Copies the specified local file to the currently set (remote) location. If the remote location is a 'directory' it will copy the file into the directory. If the remote location points to a file the remote file will likely be overwritten (or an exception is thrown).
        Parameters:
        localFile -
        delete - indicates if the localFile must be deleted after a successful copy
        Throws:
        IOException

      • list

        List<String> list()
        List all 'files' within the current location which match the provided extensions. If the extensions is null than all files will be returned.
        Returns:

      • getProtocol

        String getProtocol()
        Returns the FileLocation's prefix (ftp, s3, file, ...)
        Returns:

      • getAsFile

        File getAsFile()
               throws IOException
        Gets the current location as a file. If the location is remote this will trigger a download
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException

        Makes a deep copy of this object
        Returns:
